Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory38.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken', 3: "Th... thank you. I... I've been marking the days on the wall with my fingernails... over a hundred days... finally...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'What happened after you were locked up here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken', 3: "What happened... I... I can't quite remember...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Forsaken', 3: "I can't remember... my head's killing me... Golden liquid... a scalpel...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I know you're in bad shape, but we don't have much time. Please, try to remember.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "That's enough! Didn't you hear him? He can't remember!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken', 3: 'Watanabe... Sir?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Is this how the Forsaken treat their saviors?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I, Watanabe, am very grateful for the Purifying Force's help.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'But right now, I need to get them all to safety.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Take the others, but not him. He's the only one who can talk.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I need to know exactly what happened here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "People's lives are more important than intel. Give me him, and I'll give you everything I know.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "The Forsaken don't make promises to the Purifying Force.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Go, or we fire.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Babylonia hasn't changed at all.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "This is exactly why I can't stand you people.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I shouldn't have bothered with you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Let's get this over with.", 4: '1'}
